alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 8:57PM EST until February 19 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Ohio... Chagrin River At Willoughby affecting Lake County. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Portage River At Woodville affecting Sandusky and Wood Counties. Sandusky River At Tiffin affecting Seneca County. Huron River Near Milan affecting Erie County. Blanchard River Near Findlay affecting Hancock County. Scioto River Near Larue affecting Marion County. Nimishillen Creek Near North Industry affecting Stark County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. Black River At Elyria affecting Lorain County. Cuyahoga River At Independence affecting Cuyahoga County. Cuyahoga River At Old Portage affecting Summit County. Maumee River At Waterville affecting Wood and Lucas Counties. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station affecting Trumbull County. For the Portage River...including Woodville...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Sandusky River...including Fremont, Upper Sandusky, Tiffin, Bucyrus...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Huron River...including Milan...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Black River...including Elyria...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Cuyahoga River...including Old Portage, Independence...Major flooding is forecast. For the Chagrin River...including Willoughby...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Blanchard River...including Findlay...Major flooding is forecast. For the Scioto River...including Larue, Prospect...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Nimishillen Creek...including North Industry...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Major flooding is forecast. For the Site Specific Non-forecast Pt...including Hiram Rapids, Phalanx Station, Findlay...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Chagrin River At Willoughby. * WHEN...Until early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Flooding is possible along the northern section of Trailard, Milann, and Chagrin Drives in Waite Hill. Dodd Road inundated near Eagle Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM EST Thursday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 13.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.2 feet on 02/26/1962. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning by 700 AM EST.
